name: AuditionM
description:
Audition - the popular dance and rhythm game with over 700 million users around the world is now available on mobile devices!

Dance to your favorite songs and customize your character!
Make new friends, create your FAM and fall in love!

Have fun and dance anytime, anywhere with Audition M!

[Game Features]

1. Addictive and enjoyable gameplay
- Real-time dance competition with your friends!
- Test your dancing skills in tournaments and compete for the throne of the dance king/queen!

2. Become a Fashion Icon
- A wide range of fashionable outfits, shining accessories and other exclusive items!
- Express your sense of style or dress up like your favorite idol and become the center of attention on the dance floor!

3. Time to fall in Love
- Meet your soul mate and make your love dreams come true in Audition M!

4. There is nothing closer than a Family!
- Join other dancers in FAM or create your own and become a master!
- Reach the top with your FAM members!

Get useful information about the game and take part in various events on the official community page!

[Official community]
https://www.facebook.com/MyAuditionM

[Customer Service]
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyAuditionM
FAQ & Help: msupport@hanbitsoft.co.kr
